public class ForwardingDecoder extends ForwardingBodyAdapter implements BodyAdapter.Decoder
A BodyAdapter.Decoder that forwards calls to another.

    • toObject

      public <T> HttpResponse.BodySubscriber<T> toObject(TypeRef<T> type, @Nullable MediaType mediaType)
      Description copied from interface: BodyAdapter.Decoder
      Returns a BodySubscriber that decodes the response body into an object of the given type using the format specified by the given media type. If mediaType is null, the decoders's default format settings will be used.

    • toDeferredObject

      public <T> HttpResponse.BodySubscriber<Supplier<T>> toDeferredObject(TypeRef<T> type, @Nullable MediaType mediaType)
      Description copied from interface: BodyAdapter.Decoder
      Returns a completed BodySubscriber that lazily decodes the response body into an object of the given type using the format specified by the given media type. If mediaType is null, the decoder's default format settings will be used.

      The default implementation returns a subscriber completed with a supplier that blocks (uninterruptedly) on the subscriber returned by BodyAdapter.Decoder.toObject(TypeRef, MediaType). Any completion exception raised while blocking is rethrown from the supplier as a CompletionException. Encoders that support reading from a blocking source should override this method to defer reading from such a source until the supplier is called.

      Specified by:
      toDeferredObject in interface BodyAdapter.Decoder
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type represent by type
      Parameters:
      type - the object type
      mediaType - the media type
